TITLE: Walgreens stock plunges after drugstore chain slashes quarterly dividend nearly in half
SUMMARY: Walgreens cut its dividend to 25 cents per share to "strengthen [its] long-term balance sheet and cash position," said CEO Tim Wentworth.

TITLE: JPMorgan Chase is set to report fourth-quarter earnings. Hereâ€™s what the Street expects
SUMMARY: JPMorgan will be watched closely for clues on how banks fared amid volatile interest rates and rising loan losses.

TITLE: Citigroup posts $1.8 billion fourth-quarter loss after litany of charges
SUMMARY: Citigroup CEO Jane Fraser announced plans for a sweeping corporate reorganization in September after previous efforts failed to boost the bank's share price.

TITLE: Wells Fargo posts higher fourth-quarter profit, helped by higher interest rates and cost cutting
SUMMARY: Wells Fargo shares fell Friday even after fourth-quarter profit rose from a year ago.

TITLE: JPMorgan Chase profit falls after $2.9 billion fee from regional bank rescues
SUMMARY: JPMorgan is watched closely for clues on how banks fared amid volatile interest rates and rising loan losses.

TITLE: Bank of America shares fall after company reports lower fourth-quarter profit, hit by regulatory charge
SUMMARY: Bank of America's net income fell to $3.1 billion in the fourth quarter from $7.1 billion a year ago.

TITLE: Delta more than doubles fourth-quarter profit, but trims 2024 earnings forecast
SUMMARY: Delta is the first of the major U.S. carriers to report earnings this period.

TITLE: Morgan Stanley revenue tops estimates, helped by strong investment banking business
SUMMARY: Morgan Stanley reported fourth-quarter earnings before the bell Tuesday.

TITLE: Goldman Sachs tops revenue estimates on better-than-expected asset management results
SUMMARY: Hope is building that Goldman Sachs can turn a corner after pivoting away from CEO David Solomon's failed consumer banking efforts.

TITLE: Morgan Stanley revenue tops estimates, but CEO warns of geopolitical, economic risks ahead
SUMMARY: Morgan Stanley reported fourth-quarter earnings before the bell Tuesday that were lower than a year ago.

TITLE: TSMC beats profit and revenue expectations in the fourth quarter
SUMMARY: The world's largest contract chipmaker TSMC on Thursday posted better-than-expected profit and revenue for the fourth quarter of 2023.
